DOC.brief_summary: Cervical spine manipulation show helpful patient neck pain . This study seek determine factor predictive patient neck pain would benefit manipulation .
DOC.brief_title: Development Clinical Prediction Rulefor Neck Manipulation
DOC.criteria: age 18 60 year primary report neck pain without unilateral upper extremity symptom baseline neck disability index score 10 point ( 50 ) great medical red flag suggest etiology symptom might nonmusculoskeletal diagnosis cervical spinal stenosis ( identified patient ' medical intake form ) bilateral upper extremity symptom evidence central nervous system involvement history whiplash injury within 6 week examination pending legal action regard neck pain 2 positive neurologic sign consistent nerve root compression ( change sensation , myotomal weakness , decrease deep tendon reflex ) history cervical spine surgery , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , osteopenia , ankylose spondylitis .
